S.FORM: Cole Aldrich hya'ga NBA pgnaw' mari' misuw qaniy, qutux sa pkaki' kkska'. kawas te 1988, byacing te 10 ru 31 ryax qu hintgan nya, kinhulan nya ga Minnesota, hiya ga mnanak na ppzuy mari waya, ru squliq ka ppkal mari waya. 211 kunbun kinwagiq nya, 115 kunkin kin'suw nya, hiya ga qutux nqu spzyang blaq na ppzuy mari NBA. kawas 2010 mnwayaw ppzuy mari ga, mzyup squ te qutux lahuy ru te magal squliq, galun nqu New Orleans Hornets. Cole Aldrich mqaws beh minisutaco,pulumitun pqwasan biru. hiya ga blaq balay qutux unrokay. 2007 kawas Cole Aldrich ga te tzyu qsahuy ru te mtzyul mzyu mari unrokay maki Amerika. kinblayqan pincyuwagan sa qnxan niya' pspngan mari sa may yugal yacing masuq mspung mari sa pspngan mari na maycyugal byacing lga cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of National Basketball Association players

Cole Aldrich hya'ga NBA pgnaw' mari' misow qaniy, qotox sa pkaki' kkska'. kawas te 1988, byacing te 10 ro 31 ryax qo hintgan nya, kinholan nya ga Minnesota, hiya ga mnanak na ppzoy mari waya, ro sqoliq ka ppkal mari waya. 211 konbon kinwagiq nya, 115 konkin kin'sow nya, hiya ga qotox nqo spzyang blaq na ppzoy mari NBA. kawas 2010 mnwayaw ppzoy mari ga, mzyop sqo te qotox lahoy ro te magal sqoliq, galon nqo New Orleans Hornets. Cole Aldrich mqaws beh minisotaco,polomiton pqwasan biro. hiya ga blaq balay qotox onrokay. 2007 kawas Cole Aldrich ga te tzyo qsahoy ro te mtzyol mzyo mari onrokay maki Amerika. kinblayqan pincyowagan sa qnxan niya' pspngan mari sa may yogal yacing masoq mspong mari sa pspngan mari na maycyogal byacing lga cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of National Basketball Association players
